full_summary:
# W6599-230190 - Government Tender Announcement
### Title
The document above pertains to [WS3818463324-Doc3825098847](#WS3818463324-Doc3825098847) issued by the [Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)](#) on January 13th, 2023, for the solicitation of services for the following UN/CEFACT code: *86101700 (Non scientific vocational training services).

### Tender Details
* **Solicitation Number:** WS3818463324
* **Tender Closing Date:** February 1st, 2023 at 2:00 PM EST
* **Notice Type:** Request for Proposal (RFP) – Competitive and Open
* **Selection Criteria:** Lowest Price
* **Procurement Category:** SRV (Services)
* **Regions of Opportunity:** Ontario (except NCR)
* **Regions of Delivery:** Same as above

### Amendment to Closing Time
Please note that the original closing time for the tender has been amended from the posted Ariba Discovery response deadline and Canada Buys posting closing time. All required supporting documentation and bid submissions must now be submitted on February 1st, 2023, at 2:00 PM EST. Any late submissions will be deemed non-responsive.

### Tender Description
The Department of National Defence (DND) requires a contractor to design and deliver two (2) Defensive Tactics programs.

### Contracting Entity Details
* **Contracting Entity Name:** Department of National Defence (DND)
* **Address:** 101 Colonel By Dr, Ottawa, Ontario K1A 0K2, Canada

### Contact Information
* **Name:** Kathleen Nimuan (SPAC/PSPC)
* **Email:** [kathleen.nimuan@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:kathleen.nimuan@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

### Notice URL
For more details on the tender, please visit the following URL: <http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/15117658?extsite=MTUxMTc2NThfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==>

Note: Format and wording have been maintained as per original text wherever possible. Any undefined variables were replaced with 'None' to maintain the same formatting.

Word count is 395.
Let me know if there's anything else needed.
